selections.name: La Morra
selections.reason: Top rated (68) winner last start at Kembla Grange. Drops slightly in weight class relative to field strength. Drawn perfectly in barrier 1 to dictate or sit handy. The one to beat.

selections.name: Call Me Son
selections.reason: Consistent performer (Rating 66). Solid 3rd at Gosford last start. Distance suits and has the class to challenge.

selections.name: Babyfaced Assassin
selections.reason: Improving type, ran a close 2nd last start. Maps well from barrier 2.

selections.name: Golden Smile
selections.reason: Has placed at this track before. Forgive last start failure, previous form (Rating 61) is competitive.

danger_horse.name: Call Me Son
danger_horse.reason: Proven consistency at this level and rates highly enough to win if the favorite falters.

selections.name: Odaka
selections.reason: Best exposed form in a decimated field. 2nd at Taree last start and rates 55, which is superior to the remaining runners.

selections.name: God Save The King
selections.reason: Waterhouse/Bott debutant. Trials have been solid enough (1st, 6th, 6th). Market watch essential in this weak field.

selections.name: Aperitas
selections.reason: Godolphin runner with scope for improvement. 5th last start but meets a very thin field here after scratches.

selections.name: Ivy Legend
selections.reason: Waller runner resuming. Trials have been okay. Respect the stable.

danger_horse.name: God Save The King
danger_horse.reason: Top stable debutant in a race with almost no depth. Could easily win without surprising.

selections.name: Good'n'you
selections.reason: Standout on figures. Rating 68 on debut (3rd at this track). Drawn the rail. Should be too classy for this maiden field.

selections.name: Bugatte
selections.reason: Waller runner resuming. Has trial form and stable always dangerous in these maidens.

selections.name: Chispa
selections.reason: First starter from the Waller yard. Watch betting moves.

selections.name: Lucky Me
selections.reason: Snowden runner. Form is average but field is weak behind the top pick.

selections.name: Gyra
selections.reason: Recent 4th was respectable in this context. Rating 38 is low but competitive here. Ideally drawn.

selections.name: Already Blue
selections.reason: Has placed form. 8th last start but drops into a very winnable race.

selections.name: Flying Truffles
selections.reason: First starter for Cavanough. Stable has good strike rate. Watch market.

selections.name: Arabian Melody
selections.reason: Resuming from very long spell. Previous form was okay. Market will guide.

selections.name: Ivy Diva
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick. Won last two starts impressively. Rating 62 and rising. Handles soft going.

selections.name: Grassburn
selections.reason: Consistent type (Rating 62). 2nd in a BM74 last start is strong form for this BM66. Major threat.

selections.name: New Pharoah
selections.reason: Resuming. Won a trial. Has high back-class (Rating 70 previously). If ready, he wins.

selections.name: Ensign Parker
selections.reason: Solid performer at this level. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Grassburn
danger_horse.reason: Coming out of a higher grade race where he ran 2nd. Very strong form line.

selections.name: Herman Said
selections.reason: Won well last start at this track. Rating 75 is the class of the field. Drawn well in 3.

selections.name: Glenbower
selections.reason: Rating 69. 4th last start resuming. Fitter now and has the ability to challenge.

selections.name: Itszarbaby
selections.reason: Consistent mare. 2nd last start. Rating 59 puts her in the mix for placings.

selections.name: Punch One Out
selections.reason: Resuming. Has good fresh record. Place hope.

danger_horse.name: Glenbower
danger_horse.reason: High rating horse who will improve second-up.

selections.name: Lucky Ozzie
selections.reason: Strong 2nd last start. Rating 63 is top tier for this BM58. Looks well placed.

selections.name: Darn Deadly
selections.reason: Last start winner. Rating 59. Improving type who handles the conditions.

selections.name: Ken'ker
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from recent runs. Drawn well.

selections.name: Chestime
selections.reason: Consistent placegetter. 3rd last start.

danger_horse.name: Darn Deadly
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is hard to knock in this grade.
